qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Richmond General Hospital and Knoxville General Hospital, what were the auxiliary examination findings for patients M. Young and L. Rogers?

content: Slit-lamp examination confirms cataract diagnosis with visible lens opacities.
No evidence of retinal detachment or other ocular pathology.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Richmond General Hospital, patient M. According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital, patient L. Blurry, foggy vision and decreased visual acuity for the past 3 months
